1. Kohl's is closing 27 stores. Here's which locations are shutting their doors.  CBS News
  2. Kohl's is closing 27 stores in 15 states. Here's where they're located  Fox Business
  3. Kohl’s is closing 27 locations. See if your store is on the list  CNN
  4. Kohl's to close 27 locations, including the one in Portland  nbc16.com
  5. Kohl’s is closing 27 stores, including this one in North Texas  Fort Worth Star-Telegram
